translations.translation: and think your provision depends on your denial of the truth?
You live by calling it a lie.
and your portion in it is simply that you denounce it as false?
Would you reject the sustenance that you receive rather than give thanks?
And you make its denial your share?
And you make your provision your denial!
And to give (it) the lie you make your means of subsistence.
and do you make it your living to cry lies?
And make denial thereof your livelihood?
Do you make its denial your means of livelihood?
And make it your provision that ye should belie it?
And make your denial of it your vocation?
And have ye made it your livelihood that ye should declare it false?
And instead (of thanking Allah) for the provision He gives you, on the contrary, you deny Him (by disbelief)!
do you make it your provision to belie it?
And you make it your livelihood to deny it?
And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?
[56:82] And for your livelihood, in the way of rain, that is to say, the thanks for it, you offer your denial?, of God’s granting it to you, by saying, ‘We have rain because of this [or that] storm’?
(And make denial thereof your livelihood) and say about the rain that you are given: we were given rain because of such-and-such a storm?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ } معناه يقولونَ مُطرنَا بنوءِ كذا وذَا
 والرِّزقُ: الشّكرُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ } حظكم ونصيبكم من هدايته وإرشاده { أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ } [الواقعة: 82] جهلاً وعناداً، أتسرفون وتفرطون في الاجتراء على الله وتكذيب كلامه ورسوله المرسل من عنده أيها المفسدون المفرطون؟!
